title: The Sinhala Only Policy, Tamil “rights” and the validity of calling Buddhists extremist in Sri Lanka
content: By Shenali Waduge To sufficiently address a global and local campaign that has as its clear objective to project Buddhists in Sri Lanka as extremists, chauvinistic and even militant is not easy and impossible given that the gavel has concluded its verdict.
